definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: honeycomb,—abs. [[יַעַר]] 1Sa 14:25, 1Sa 14:26; sf. [[יַעְרִי]] Ct So 5:1; —honeycomb, containing honey 1Sa 14:25 (where rd. [[וְיַעַר הָיׇה עַל־פְּנֵּי הַשָּׂדֶה]] with LXX We Dr Kit in Kau:AT, instead of v. as in MT); [[וַיׇּבוֹא העם אֶל־הַיַּעַר]] 1Sa 14:26 (‖[[דבשׁ]]v:1Sa 14:25) and when the people came to the honeycomb behold its bees had departed (v. LXX We Dr Kit VB); [[אָכַלְתִּי יַעְרִי עִם־דִּבְשִׁי]] Ct So 5:1; v. also I. [[יַעֲרָה]].
